content.raw:
when I first saw the name of the `pointcloud2` message file, I assumed it was an analog of [sensor_msgs/PointCloud2](https://docs.ros.org/melodic/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/PointCloud2.html), but it looks like it is a message type that will be deprecated in msgs5? Apologies if this is bike-shedding the name, but I just want to make sure people won't confuse the two.

maybe `pointcloud_color.proto`?
content.html:
when I first saw the name of the pointcloud2 message file, I assumed it was an analog of sensor_msgs/PointCloud2, but it looks like it is a message type that will be deprecated in msgs5? Apologies if this is bike-shedding the name, but I just want to make sure people won't confuse the two.

maybe pointcloud_color.proto?
